homeAbout.description: AM Forest is a leading forest management company in Latvia with over 14 years of industry experience. We offer a full range of services, from forest inventory to timber trading.

aboutHero.heading2: that inspires confidence and security at every
aboutHero.description: Thanks to the dedication and expertise of our team at AM Forest, we continue to grow and inspire confidence. Each member plays a key role in the success of your forestry projects, combining rigor with a human approach to sustainable forest management.

aboutContent.heading: Our Story
aboutContent.p1: Founded with a vision to revolutionize forest management in Latvia, AM Forest has grown from a small team of passionate foresters to a leading force in sustainable forestry practices.
aboutContent.p2: We combine decades of traditional forestry knowledge with cutting-edge technology to provide comprehensive forest management solutions that benefit both nature and our clients.
aboutContent.p3: Our commitment to excellence and sustainability has earned us the trust of landowners, communities, and environmental organizations throughout the Baltic region.

reviews.heading: Reviews
reviews.quote: Very professional team and excellent service! They showed high quality in their work and were very responsive to all our needs. I definitely recommend to everyone looking for reliable forestry specialists.
reviews.author: Andris Ozols

imageLinks.link1: Why should you maintain your forest?
imageLinks.link3: When is the right time to harvest?

cta.heading: Ready? Contact us to get started

homeFaq.question: What forest management services are offered?
homeFaq.answer: We offer a full forest management cycle: forest inventory, management plan development, young stand tending, forest planting, sanitary felling, as well as consultations on sustainable forest management.

homeFaq.question: Do you offer timber purchasing?
homeFaq.answer: Yes, we purchase timber directly from forest owners. We ensure competitive prices, professional assessment, and fast payment. We work with various timber species — pine, spruce, birch, and other tree species.

homeFaq.question: How does forest inventory work?
homeFaq.answer: Forest inventory includes a detailed account and evaluation of forest resources. Our specialists use modern technologies and methods to determine tree species composition, age, growth volumes, and forest health status. After the inventory, you will receive a detailed report with recommendations.

homeFaq.question: What are the forest restoration options after harvesting?
homeFaq.answer: We offer several forest restoration methods: natural regeneration, artificial forest restoration by planting or seeding. We help choose the most suitable tree species for specific growing conditions and provide quality planting material.

homeFaq.question: Do you provide consultations on EU and state support programs?
homeFaq.answer: Yes, our specialists provide consultations on available EU funds and state support programs for forest owners. We help prepare the necessary documentation and applications, and advise on the conditions for receiving support.

homeFaq.question: How is the timber price determined?
homeFaq.answer: Timber price is determined taking into account several factors: tree species, quality, assortment structure, forwarding distance, and market situation. For each object, we perform an individual assessment and offer the best possible price.

contact.description: We're here to help with all your forestry needs. Whether you have questions about our services, need a consultation, or want to discuss a project, don't hesitate to reach out.

perkamMezuFaq.question: What is the forest property price per hectare in Latvia in 2024?
perkamMezuFaq.answer: Forest property prices in Latvia in 2024 range from 2,000 to 8,000 EUR per hectare depending on tree species, age, quality, and location. Pine and spruce stands with good accessibility and 40-80 years of age reach the highest prices. AM Forest offers free professional assessment to determine the exact market value of your forest property.

perkamMezuFaq.question: How to sell a forest property in Latvia — step by step?
perkamMezuFaq.answer: Forest property selling process: 1) Contact AM Forest for a free consultation, 2) Our experts perform a professional forest inventory and assessment, 3) Receive a fair price offer within 48 hours, 4) We process all documents at the notary, 5) Money is transferred immediately after the transaction. On average, the process takes 7-14 days.

perkamMezuFaq.question: Is it more profitable to sell forest with a timber stand or after harvesting?
perkamMezuFaq.answer: AM Forest buys forest properties in all conditions — both with ready timber stands and after harvesting. Unharvested forest with mature stands (60-80 years) is often more valuable as the buyer has more freedom of choice. Harvested properties with young stands (5-20 years) are also in demand for long-term investments. We ensure a competitive price regardless of forest condition.

perkamMezuFaq.question: What documents are needed for selling a forest property?
perkamMezuFaq.answer: For forest sale you need: land register certificate, forest inventory data (not older than 10 years), personal identification document, and tax payment confirmation. AM Forest helps arrange missing documents, performs new inventory at no cost, and provides legal support throughout the transaction process, including communication with the State Forest Service.

perkamCirsmuFaq.question: What is the timber stand price per cubic meter in Latvia in 2024?
perkamCirsmuFaq.answer: Timber stand prices in Latvia in 2024 range from 35 to 85 EUR per cubic meter depending on tree species, quality, diameter, and accessibility. Pine and spruce stands with large-diameter trees and good accessibility reach the highest prices. AM Forest offers free professional assessment to determine the exact market value of your timber stand.

perkamCirsmuFaq.question: How to sell a timber stand in Latvia — step by step?
perkamCirsmuFaq.answer: Timber stand selling process: 1) Contact AM Forest for a free consultation, 2) Our experts perform a professional stand measurement and assessment, 3) Receive a fair price offer within 24 hours, 4) We process the timber stand purchase agreement, 5) Money is transferred immediately after signing. On average, the process takes 3-7 days.

perkamCirsmuFaq.question: Is it more profitable to sell a standing timber stand or harvested timber?
perkamCirsmuFaq.answer: AM Forest buys timber stands in all forms — both standing and already harvested timber. Standing timber is more convenient for the forest owner as all work is done by the buyer. Harvested timber can yield higher profit but requires additional investment and risk. We ensure a competitive price in both cases and can help choose the most profitable option.

perkamCirsmuFaq.question: What factors affect the timber stand value?
perkamCirsmuFaq.answer: Main factors: tree species (pine, spruce, birch), tree diameter and height, timber quality (straightness, number of branches), accessibility (road quality, distance), stand size and concentration. AM Forest experts evaluate all these factors to offer the most favorable price for your timber stand.
